item.name: Play the specified card as influence

query.description: Specify if only validate the play

request.description: Play the specified card as influence

response.name: Card

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.body:
{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "Black Monday",
  "epoch": "Pre",
  "description": "US and EU lose supremacy on all NWO economy slots.",
  "points": 2,
  "faction": "E",
  "type": "Economy",
  "remove": true,
  "image": "images/blackMonday.jpg",
  "background": "#DDDDFF",
  "year": "ipsum qui fugiat in",
  "subtype": ""
}

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Play the specified card as destabilization. This play consists of 2 requests

request.description: Play the specified card as destabilization. This play consists of 2 requests. 1st request will return the result of a dice throw (1 to 6) + card points - the country stability points * 2. If the country is conflictive you lose 1 VP. If result X is positive, you can add (superpowers of your block) or remove (opposing superpowers) up to X points of influence

response.name: Card
